price: To, idan sun yi ĩmãni* da misãlin abin da kuka yi ĩmãni da shi, to, lalle ne sun shiryu, kuma idan sun jũya bãya, to, suna a cikin sãɓãni kawai sabõda haka Allah zai isar maka a gare su, kuma Shi ne Mai ji, Masani.
arabic: فَإِنۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِمِثۡلِ مَآ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ فَقَدِ ٱهۡتَدَواْۖ وَّإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا هُمۡ فِي شِقَاقٖۖ فَسَيَكۡفِيكَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
footnotes: * Ĩmãni irin na Musulmi shi ne rinin Allah watau baptisma.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in āmanū bimith'li mā āmantum bihi faqadi ih'tadaw wa-in tawallaw fa-innamā hum fī shiqāqin fasayakfīkahumu al-lahu wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
translations: So will suffice you against them
